meanings.definition: Relating to puberty or the period of adolescence.
meanings.sent1: The puberal changes in her body were noticeable to everyone.
meanings.sent2: During the puberal years, teenagers experience many physical transformations.
meanings.sent3: The puberal awkwardness made him trip over his own feet.
meanings.sent4: Her puberal growth spurt seemed to happen overnight.
meanings.sent5: The puberal emotions can be overwhelming for some young people.

meanings.definition: In the stage of development between childhood and adulthood.
meanings.sent1: The puberal behavior of the young cat showed its playful nature.
meanings.sent2: As a puberal individual, she was eager to explore the world around her.
meanings.sent3: His puberal enthusiasm for learning was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The puberal phase of the project marked a significant transition.
meanings.sent5: The puberal energy of the puppies was infectious.
